'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. It refers to the space below the main deck of both ''[The Defiant](/theDefiant/)'' and other player ships. The entry point to belowdecks on all ship types is towards the stern.

There are two additional variants called "[Stranded Ship](/strandedShip/)", used in quests.

##  Background 

{{Main|The Defiant}}
Belowdecks is where sailors spend most of their downtime. Here you'll find a number of your companions and crew, a few of which are roaming about, earning their keep in maintaining the ship.

## Characters

* [The Steward](/theSteward/)
* Any crew members that are part of the current crew (and are not injured) will appear working belowdecks. Depending on their assigned job, a crew member will appear in a different position on the ship.

## =Companions

=
Depending on the current type of ship, these companions may appear in different places.
* [Aloth](/aloth/)
* [Edér](/eder/)
* [Fassina](/fassina/)
* [Konstanten](/konstanten/)
* [Pallegina](/pallegina/)
* [Xoti](/xoti/)
* [Ydwin](/ydwin/)
